name: Ghostophobia
description:
Ghostophobia is clone of Phasmophobia

Phasmophobia in Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/739630/Phasmophobia/

Warning: The game is in active development. Updates are released at least once or twice a week. If possible, report bugs and rate the game.

Warning 2: The number of players is very small, if you want to play in multiplayer, then invite a friend from Discord.

Controls :

V - voice (you can tell to ghost)

WASD + Mouse - move

E - open door / get item (you cant get more than 3 items)

G - drop item

1, 2, 3 (or mouse scrollwheel) - select item

More details in the game manual
